title: Ephemera, "Album: Golden Blossom Honey Label"
description: A dark green band across the upper half and gilt band across the lower comprise the background color scheme of the present object, a label for a cylindrical container of honey. Type is imprinted in white. Golden/ Blossom/ Honey is imprinted in serif-style capitals in the center of the green; on either side, two columns, each composed of three abbreviated circles in alternating green and gilt, complete the central design. Ten rows of additional product information, placed to the right and left of the central design, are imprinted in miniscule italicized type. In the lower third of the gilt, Genuine Natural Honey 100% pure is imprinted in a hand-lettered style italicized type.

tombstone.epitaph: Ephemera, "Album: Golden Blossom Honey Label". 9.7 x 20.3 cm (3 7/8 x 8 in.). Gift of Ellen Gustav Jensen. 1956-47-84-rr.
